author: @ Cnn
title: Discussing - Pope Francis has pneumonia in both lungs, Vatic…
text:
Discussions
from Michigan commented…7hrs7H
Prayers for Pope Francis, but let's not forget how he's steered the Church in a direction that many traditional Catholics find concerning. Maybe it's time for a return to stronger, more unwavering leadership.
from Illinois commented…7hrs7H
Wishing Pope Francis a speedy recovery. His focus on social justice and climate change is crucial in these times—hope he gets well soon to continue his important work!
